data.actual_result: The other remains in the same status they were in when Discord was closed.
data.expected_result: The other will appear as offline.
data.short_description: Users appear as online, despite them actually being offline or invisible
data.steps_to_repro: - You'll need either a friend or an alt accont to do this.  - Have the other set to online, idle or in dnd.   - Exit Discord, but do not close it. (As in do not force close or swipe close.)  - Have the other go offline.  (Invisible might work too, although I can't confirm.)  - Open Discord again and check the other's status.
